name: Release v5.8.0-alpha.17
body:
# Changelog v5.8.0-alpha.17 (2019-09-13)

This changelog covers the changes between [v5.7.0 and v5.8.0-alpha.17](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/compare/v5.7.0...v5.8.0-alpha.17).

For further reference, please refer to the changelog of the previous version, [v5.7.0](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/releases/tag/v5.7.0).

## Merged Pull Requests

- #1743 📝 Update README (merged 2019-09-12)
- #1742 ✨ Add a link to the dynamic ui documentation/readme (merged 2019-09-12)
- #1741 ♻ ️ Improve inspect correlation performance (merged 2019-09-12)
- #1738 ✨ Add Enlarge Button for Script Task (merged 2019-09-13)
- #1737 🐛 Fix Style of DJS-Palette (merged 2019-09-11)
- #1736 ⬆ ️ Bump eslint-utils from 1.4.0 to 1.4.2 (merged 2019-09-10)
- #1735 Update ci_tools to 2.0.0 (merged 2019-09-10)
- #1733 ♻ ️ Improve performance of inspect/dashboard (merged 2019-09-10)
- #1731 ✨ Maximize/Unmaximize window after double clicking on the navbar (merged 2019-09-12)
- #1728 ♻ ️ Cleanup NPM Scripts (merged 2019-09-12)
- #1727 🐛 Fix Showing Diff View on Remote Solution (merged 2019-09-09)
- #1725 ♻ ️Add test classes for views (merged 2019-09-12)
- #1724 🐛 Stop Closing Open Diagram on Delete (merged 2019-09-09)
- #1723 🐛 Fix Active Diagram Highlighting in SolutionExplorer (merged 2019-09-09)
- #1722 🔖 Set Version to '5.8.0' (merged 2019-09-05)
- #1721 ✨ Use TS instead of JS on get-path-and-run-tests (merged 2019-09-06)
- #1720 🐛 Fix Diagram Changes Indicator (merged 2019-09-05)
- #1719 ✨ Add expose functionality module (merged 2019-09-06)
- #1715 🐛 Fix Icon Path for About Window (merged 2019-09-05)
- #1712 🐛 Fix diagram has changed notification bug  (merged 2019-09-03)
- #1711 🐳 Add Docker Build Step (merged 2019-09-03)
- #1707 ✨ Use Own Electron Updater (merged 2019-09-03)
- #1706 Add spectron and tests (merged 2019-09-02)
- #1697 ✨ Persists Property Panel Input Heights (merged 2019-08-29)
- #1696 ✨ Make Diagrams Deployable via Solution Explorer (merged 2019-09-05)
- #1689 ✨ Add first draft of user config (merged 2019-09-02)
- #1684 ✨ Add intermediate link events to property panel (merged 2019-09-02)
- #1682 ✨ Open bpmn.io in browser instead in electron (merged 2019-09-03)
- #1660 ♻ ️ Rewrite JS Code in TS (merged 2019-08-29)
- #1657 ✨ Improve FlowNode Selection in Inspect Correlation (merged 2019-08-29)
- #1649 📝 Add documentation about supported BPMN elements (merged 2019-09-02)
- #1637 ⬆ ️ Update Electron to 6.x.x (merged 2019-09-05)

## Corresponding Issues

- #1734 🐛 Closing the SolutionExplorer does not move the left tools with it
- #1730 Double-clicking the title bar does not maximize the window
- #1726 🐛 Diff View Does Not Get Displayed on Remote Solution
- #1718 🐛 Changed Indicator is Sometimes Wrong
- #1710 🐛 Save All Diagrams Is Not Working
- #1708 Frontend Tests
- #1695 🐛 When Deploying a Diagram Every Diagram with the Same Name Will Be Marked
- #1694 🐛 Deleting a Diagram Closes One From the Open Diagram Section
- #1690 ✨ Benutzereinstellungen
- #1681 ✨ Remeber Size of ScriptTask Script Field
- #1661 ✨ Enlarge Feature on Script Task
- #1644 PropertyPanel unterstützt keine IntermediateLinkCatchEvents und IntermediateLinkThrowEvents
- #1640 🐛 The Autoupdater Does Not Work Correctly in the Alpha and Beta Versions.
- #1477 BPMN.io-Seite öffnet in Electron-BrowserWindow
- #1395 ✨ Add "Deploy" Button to Solution Explorer for quick access
- #1071 💄 Improve Handling of FlowNode Selection in the Inspect Panel
- #393 📝 Document all functional elements

name: Release v5.7.0
body:
# Release Notes v5.7.0

## What's new in BPMN Studio `v5.7.0`?

### Updated name

That's a slight exaggeration. The app has been renamed from `bpmn-studio` to `BPMN Studio`. Once you have the new app, you can safely delete the old one (your diagrams, process databases and configs are *not* affected).

### Introducing release channels

Starting with version `v5.7.0` we are introducing two additional release channels, next to our usual, stable releases:

1. **Beta versions** are released on a weekly basis and contain features which are planned for the upcoming stable release (example: `v5.8.0-beta.1`).
2. **Alpha versions** are released whenever a new feature is ready to hit the road and has been reviewed for test-driving (example: `v5.8.0-alpha.23`)

These new apps can be installed alongside each other and alongside the stable version without any interference.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/311914/64262059-ce1d1080-cf2d-11e9-86bc-d1ef19f12043.png)

In case you want to connect from one of these apps to the internal ProcessEngine of another one of these apps, no problem: The discovery assistant detects another version of BPMN Studio running on your system and let's you connect seamlessly:

![Auto Discovery](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/311914/64262351-4257b400-cf2e-11e9-97b0-584284a86e67.gif)

Doing our release cycles this way has two reasons: We are able to provide a quality product for those relying on stable software while still providing a cutting edge experience to early adopters through alpha and beta versions.


### Tracking down errors

The live execution tracker allows users to watch and inspect their process instances while they are running.

Now you can also dig into activities that went south by jumping directly into "Inspect Correlation".

![Tracking down errors](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/311914/64262527-834fc880-cf2e-11e9-8f38-489ae340e172.gif)

### Get notified when files change in the background


BPMN Studio will inform you every time a file has changed on disk. This is especially useful when using version control systems like Git or cloud storage providers like Google Drive:

![Get notified when files change](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/311914/64263907-c01cbf00-cf30-11e9-9c50-e1044bcc7e2a.gif)

### Version check when connecting to remote ProcessEngines

BPMN Studio will inform you when you try to connect to a ProcessEngine with a different SemVer major version than the one used by the Studio.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/311914/64262192-03c1f980-cf2e-11e9-9642-4fbfd25969ca.png) ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/311914/64262203-0886ad80-cf2e-11e9-9966-62640184db2c.png)


### Unified font sizes

Looks aren't everything, but BPMN Studio now looks much more streamlined text-wise:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/311914/64262225-12101580-cf2e-11e9-8f47-4034be078b9b.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/311914/64262239-16d4c980-cf2e-11e9-967d-8675b4e9a620.png)


## Full Changelog v5.7.0 (2019-09-04)

- #1607 "Open Diagrams" are not sorted by name
- #1605 Changes to diagrams outside of BPMN Studio should create some kind of notification
- #1598 Fehlermeldung „Could not colorize XML“ nach Deployment auf interne PE
- #1597 "Total" in Listen in Dashboard anzeigen
- #1595 "Lade grade Daten"-Zustand fehlt in Ansichten
- #1593 Errors (return ExternalTaskBpmnError) from external tasks aren't handled correct
- #1592 ✨Add "Enlarge" Feature to the Payloadfield of External Tasks
- #1588 🐛BPMN-Studio Doesn't Show Correct Called Process in Call Activity
- #1584 ✨Task-Typen in der Task-List und andere Arten von Tasks anzeigen
- #1576 🐛 Canceling and Restarting of a Download is not Possible
- #1575 Display the Download Speed of an Update in MB/s
- #1400 Check the Runtime Version on Connect
- #1071 💄 Improve Handling of FlowNode Selection in the Inspect Panel
- #777 💬Shall We Remove Pre-Release Tags After Publishing a Stable Version?
- #312 ⚡️ The Internal ProcessEngine Runs on the UI Thread!

This changelog covers the changes between [v5.6.2 and v5.7.0-alpha.33](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/compare/v5.6.2...v5.7.0-alpha.33).

For further reference, please refer to the changelog of the previous version, [v5.6.2](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/releases/tag/v5.6.2).

## Merged Pull Requests

- #1668 🐛 Fix Reloading Inspect After Diagram Was Removed (merged 2019-08-21)
- #1666 ♻️ Improve design view performance (merged 2019-08-21)
- #1665 🐛 Fix Closing Unsaved Diagrams (merged 2019-08-19)
- #1662 🐛 Avoid Displaying Notification When Creating Diagram (merged 2019-08-19)
- #1659 ♻️ Select Flow Nodes via Bpmnjs in Inspect Correlation (merged 2019-08-19)
- #1658 Change wording "bpmn-studio" -> "BPMN Studio" (merged 2019-08-14)
- #1656 ♻️ Refactor Error Handling in 'Open Remote Solution' Modal (merged 2019-08-20)
- #1655 🚚 Link to the Getting Started instead of outdated documentation (merged 2019-08-13)
- #1654 🐛Fix bug where http requests are send to about:open-diagrams (merged 2019-08-13)
- #1650 🐛Update the taks-list when a processinstance gets stopped (merged 2019-08-13)
- #1648 🐛 Fix Diagram Creation When Diagram Called 'Untitled' Exists (merged 2019-08-13)
- #1646 ⬆️ Update Electron to 5.x.x (merged 2019-08-12)
- #1645 🐛 Fix installing the npm package (merged 2019-08-12)
- #1643 ✨Check the runtime version and display information icons (merged 2019-08-12)
- #1642 ✨ Add Overlays to Elements With Error (merged 2019-08-12)
- #1641 Save tokenviewer collapse state (merged 2019-08-12)
- #1639 ⬆️ Update Runtime to 8.5.0-alpha.5 (merged 2019-08-07)
- #1636 ✨ Add Default Remote Solution Discovery (merged 2019-08-07)
- #1635 🔥Remove file associations for alpha and beta (merged 2019-08-07)
- #1634 🐛Fix latest yaml (merged 2019-08-06)
- #1633 🐛 Fix Diagram Creation (merged 2019-08-06)
- #1630 💄Adjust AutoUpdater for alpha and beta releases (merged 2019-08-06)
- #1629 Add release channel service (merged 2019-08-06)
- #1628 Set name in package.json while building Electron (merged 2019-08-06)
- #1624 ✨Set default ProcessEngine ports (merged 2019-08-02)
- #1623 Optimize build step (merged 2019-08-02)
- #1622 Add electron builder config (merged 2019-08-02)
- #1621 ✨Use events on process list (merged 2019-08-01)
- #1619 ✨ Update the task-list only if a task is waiting or has been finished (merged 2019-08-01)

## Closed Issues

- #1667 Bad performance when modelling with very large diagrams
- #1664 🐛 Unsaved Diagrams Do Not Close When You Click on "Save" in the Modal
- #1663 🐛 "Changed on Disk" Notification Gets Displayed When Creating a New Diagram via SolutonExplorer
- #1653 🐛Reloading on Inspect Leads to White Screen
- #1652 🐛BPMN-Studio Scans Ports and does not Handle Errors
- #1651 🐛No Error Message When Connection to PE Fails
- #1647 TokenViewer State sollte gespeichert werden
- #1631 Neues Diagramm in Solution führt zu "Instant Fehlermeldung"

# Release Notes BPMN-Studio 5.6.2

This changelog _only_ covers the changes between [v5.6.0 and 5.6.2](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/compare/v5.6.0...5.6.2).

Also see the changelog of the previous version, [v5.6.0](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/releases/tag/v5.6.0).

## Bugfixes

Fix an issue with the internal ProcessEngine, which could cause it to be unavailable, when a TimerEvent was misconfigured.

## Full Changelog

d9a348b :bug:  Fix timer event parsing

This release was withdrawn, because something went wrong during the bunding of the runtime.

Please use v5.6.2 instead.

# Release Notes BPMN-Studio 5.6.0

This changelog _only_ covers the changes between [v5.5.0 and 5.6.0](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/compare/v5.5.0...5.6.0).

Also see the changelog of the previous version, [v5.5.0](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/releases/tag/v5.5.0).

## Major Features

- Untitled Diagrams Functionality
- Remote Solution History
- Active Cronjob Table
- Collapsible Solutions

## Other Features

- Better File Menu
- Various Bugfixes
- Deploy Warning Modal
- Delete Open Diagrams
- LiveExecutionTracker uses Events
- Web Version is Working Again

## Fixed Issues

- #1050 :bug: Diagram on PE gets overwritten without warning
- #1314 :recycle: Refactor Using of Fetch Clients
- #1384 User has to Double Click on Cancel when the Save Unsaved Changes Modal is Shown
- #1401 Newly created diagrams should be stored in memory
- #1432 Update "aurelia-route-recognizer"
- #1436 :bug: PageSize in ProcessInstance list gets circumvented, when dealing with correlations with multiple ProcessInstances
- #1490 :arrow_up: :lock: Update dependencies
- #1498 :bug: LET no longer colorizes some activities
- #1512 :children_crossing: Make solutions collapsible
- #1514 :bug: Local and Remote solutions use different default alignments and zoom factors
- #1515 :bug: Process flies out of the window after start
- #1525 :bug: The Empty Camunda Properties are Back
- #1530 :bug: Web-Version funktioniert nicht mehr
- #1543 :bug: Task Modal Does Not Show up When Continuing Tasks
- #1546 :sparkles: Display list of a remote solution's active cronjobs
- #1548 :bug: Process Lists Pagination Does Not Work Correctly
- #1553 :bug: Properties-Section Does Not Get Updated
- #1555 :bug: Pagination breaks Style of the Dashboard
- #1558 :lipstick: Style of 'Not supported while opened' looks broken
- #1561 :recycle: The DateService Needs to be Refactored
- #1564 Geöffnetes Diagramm löschen können
- #1566 Studio lädt beim ersten Start keine Solutions
- #1568 :bug: Selecting diagrams on Open Diagrams is broken
- #1570 :bug: Close All Diagrams Does Not Work Correctly.
- #1573 :ok_hand: Add some improvements for #1567

## Full Changelog

- c772c28e :arrow_up: Update custom bundle
- 6589e339 :arrow_up: Update dependencies
- 6afa0b97 :bug: Fit viewport when import on viewer has been done

- 38de9722 :bug: Fix Close All Diagrams

- 069d0c55 :bug: Prevent Saving Diagram State of Remote Diagrams

# Release Notes BPMN-Studio v5.5.0

This changelog _only_ covers the changes between [v5.4.0 and v5.5.0](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/compare/v5.4.0...v5.5.0).

Also see the changelog of the previous version, [v5.4.0](https://github.com/process-engine/bpmn-studio/releases/tag/v5.4.0).

## Major Features

- "Open Diagrams"-Functionality
- "Save As..."-Functionality

## Other Features

- Documentation Modal
- FlowNodeIds in Log Viewer
- Show the Tasks Type on the Property Panel Instead of "General"
- Mark Primary Buttons
- Various Bug Fixes

## Fixed Issues

- #1129 Studio does not wait until the internal ProcessEngine is ready
- #1449 :bug: LET Bug With More Active Correlations
- #1460 LiveExecutionTracking shows a green REST task although a error occured
- #1464 :bug: TokenViewer Returns Only One Token For A Specific Correlation
- #1473 :bug: File Association is Broken When BPMN-Studio is Closed.
- #1483 :bug: "Unsaved Changes" dialog is shown when clicking on Error Events
- #1491 :sparkles: Add FlowNodeId and FlowNodeInstanceId to LogViewer
- #1493 :recycle: Prevent usage of cyclic timers on Boundary- and Intermediate events
- #1499 Feinschliff: Doku-Modal
- #1520 :bug: Clicking on conditional SequenceFlows marks a diagram as "edited"
- #1521 :bug: It is possible to edit the docs field on remote solutions
- #1523 :bug: Diagrams Can No Longer Be Opened in the Browser
- #1527 :bug: Unsaved changes icon shown without changes
- #371 Dateimanagement: kein „Datei speichern unter“-Dialog
- #374 Dateimanagement: Änderungen sollten bei Wechsel der Ansicht erhalten bleiben
- #385 PropertyPanel: Arten von Tasks leichter identifizierbar machen
- #699 :sparkles: Find a Way to Display a Warning When Pool is About to be Collapsed

## Full Changelog

- 7cc32938 :arrow_up: Bump open From 0.0.5 to 6.0.0
- 0d6e7b8c :art: Improve Discoverability of Docs Modal
- b283197c :bug: Fix Bug Where Diagram Is Marked as Edited When Clicking on Conditional Flows
- 9f282770 :bug: Fix Bug Where Editing Docs of a Diagram Is Possible on Remote Solutions
- 5504ff64 :bug: Fix Edited Bug
- 7a93e64f :bug: Fix File Association
- 686c9ecb :bug: Fix LET Event Initialization; :bug: Fix Getting Tasks in Dynamic UI
- e97f431e :bug: Fix Navbar on Windows and Fullscreen
- 5f30974f :bug: Fix Opening Diagrams in Browser
- 888456d6 :bug: Token Viewer Fix
- 927668e6 :bug: Update Diagram Creation XML
- 59dad8f1 :fire: Prevent Use of Cyclic Timers
- ecb19899 :fire: Remove Wrench of Pool Contextpad
- 90c6d1d3 :lipstick: Mark Primary Buttons
- 57c53ff3 :lipstick: Show the Tasks Type on the Property Panel Instead of General
- 13d6dd18 :recycle: Colorize Elements with Errors in Red
- 72a0f099 :recycle: Use ProcessInstance in InspectCorrelation
- ed57bebb :sparkles: Add Docu Modal
- 862102f2 :sparkles: Add FlowNodeIds to LogViewer
- 7dca0689 :sparkles: Add Open Diagrams Functionality
- 8bf0e415 :sparkles: Add Save As Menu Entry
- 36c85d21 :sparkles: Show Loading Spinner on Solution If Processengine Is Not Available

## Known Issues

- The LET has been switched back to use polling, because the Event based LET did not work on remote solutions at all
- The web version is currently unavailable, due to a bug with the bundler. A fix is being implemented in: #1531
